title: Fuel Cost Included
subTitle: Don't worry about mileage! All fuel costs are included. If you refill fuel, we'll pay you back!

title: No Hidden Charges
subTitle: Our prices include taxes and insurance. What you see is what you really pay!

title: Flexi Pricing Package
subTitle: One size never fits all! Choose a balance of time and kilometers that works best for you.

title: Go Anywhere
subTitle: Our cars have all-India permits.Just remember to pay state tolls and entry taxes.

title: 24x7 Roadside assistance
subTitle: We have round-the-clock, pan India partners. Help is never far away from you.!
